page.title: 19DRAWBAR CLUB
page.content: Drawbar club Blackhead. 130 members including local farmers and residents and young people from a wide area.It has a live group or disco on a Saturday.Open all the year round exept Christmas day.The managing family came from Scotland as they had enjoyed Cornwall when on holiday. The Club is situated on the Little Trevothen Caravan Park which covers 10 acres. 35 static caravans and space for tourers and campers. The 1985 high season charge for a two berth caravan is Â£85-50. There is a shop,laundry and toilet block. There are 2 pool teams and 2 dart teams. Membership is Â£3 for a single person. The owner keeps a special eye on young visitors.
